origin_data = flight_json['slice'][0]['segment'][0]['leg'][0]
dest_data = flight_json['slice'][-1]['segment'][-1]['leg'][-1]
return cls(origin=origin_data['origin'], dest=dest_data['destination'],
    currency=flight_json['saleTotal'][:3], price=flight_json['saleTotal'][3
    :], departure=parse_qpx_time(origin_data['departureTime']), arrival=
    parse_qpx_time(dest_data['arrivalTime']))
classmethod
